Question: Which FConcurrency*?
Constraint/Rule: if (!(!FLogging && !featureLoggingFinest)) {FConcurrency* = featureTransaction;}if (!(!FStatisticsFeatures*.featureStatisticsLock && !FStatisticsFeatures*.featureStatisticsTransaction)) {FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;}if (FDbOperation*.featureDeleteDb) {featureMemoryBudget = true;featureINCompressor = true;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FEvictor = true;}if (FConcurrency*.featureLatch) {featureVerifier = true;featureTreeVisitor = true;featureMemoryBudget = true;featureINCompressor = true;FStatisticsFeatures* = featureStatisticsLock;FPersistencyFeatures* = featureFileHandleCache;FEvictor = true;FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;FConcurrency* = featureFSync;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FConcurrency* = featureCheckLeaks;}if (featureLoggingFine) {featureINCompressor = true;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FEvictor = true;}if (featureMemoryBudget) {FConcurrency* = featureLatch;FEvictor = true;}if (featureStatisticsEnvFSync) {FConcurrency* = featureFSync;}if (FStatisticsFeatures*.featureStatisticsTransaction) {FConcurrency* = featureTransaction;}if (FConcurrency*.featureTransaction) {FDbOperation* = featureTruncateDb;FConcurrency* = dummyFeatureLocking;FDbOperation* = featureDeleteDb;}
